issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] execution context's create_physical_plan should take self as immutable reference
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9157](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9157). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's not mutating self, so mutable reference is not necessary.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9157?focusedCommentId=17141552) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7464
